SEARCH
Package Pharmacist.Controller

Class PharmacistController

java.lang.Object
Pharmacist.Controller.PharmacistController
public class PharmacistController extends Object
Controller class for managing actions related to Pharmacist. Provides methods for interacting with pharmacist, prescription, and inventory repositories.

    • createPharmacistFromUser

      public static Pharmacist createPharmacistFromUser(User user)
      Creates a Pharmacist from a given User.
      Parameters:
      user - The user object containing pharmacist details.
      Returns:
      A Pharmacist object or null if not found.

    • viewPrescriptionDetails

      public static void viewPrescriptionDetails(String patientId)
      Displays the details of prescriptions for a given patient ID.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient.

    • updatePrescriptionStatusById

      public static boolean updatePrescriptionStatusById(String prescriptionId, String newStatus)
      Updates the status of a prescription by its ID.
      Parameters:
      prescriptionId - The ID of the prescription to update.
      newStatus - The new status to set (e.g., pending, dispensed).
      Returns:
      True if the update was successful, false otherwise.

    • getInventory

      public static List<Inventory> getInventory()
      Retrieves all inventory items.
      Returns:
      A list of Inventory objects.

    • requestRestock

      public static void requestRestock(String medicationName)
      Requests a restock for a specified medication if its quantity is below the low stock alert.
      Parameters:
      medicationName - The name of the medication.

    • deletePharmacistById

      public static boolean deletePharmacistById(String id)
      Deletes a pharmacist by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the pharmacist to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the pharmacist was successfully deleted, false otherwise.
